<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Imeckus Stroon](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2311)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 311</row>

**Perception** +25

**Languages**
[Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Skald](/Languages.aspx?ID=42)

**Skills**
[Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +25, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +25, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +23, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +22, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +21, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +25, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [+1 major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [staff of fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=356) (7 charges), spellbook (_The Inward Flowing Source_—contains all prepared spells plus an additional 4 spells of each level of the GM's choice—including lock)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +23 

**Will** +22 

</row>

**HP** 210

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff_ +24 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 2d4+3bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +21 ([thrown 10 ft.](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Arcane Spells Prepared** DC 33, attack +23
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=174)
- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=367)
- **4th**
[Discern Lies](/Spells.aspx?ID=74), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362)
- **5th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272), [Wall of Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=364)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=268), [Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338)

**Drain Lintwerth** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** Imeckus hasn't yet acted on his turn and Lintwerth is in an adjacent square; **Effect** Imeckus draws power from his bond with his familiar. During his turn, he gains the ability to cast one spell he prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot. He must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements. Enhanced Familiar; Imeckus Stroon's familiar [Lintwerth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2310) is a loyal companion and is a bit more powerful than the standard familiar in that he does not possess the minion trait; Imeckus can direct Lintwerth's actions verbally as a free action. If Lintwerth is slain, Imeckus becomes drained 1 for 24 hours.

**Steady Spellcasting**   If a reaction would disrupt Imeckus's spellcasting action, he attempts a DC 15 flat check; if he succeeds, his action isn't disrupted.

**Recall Lintwerth** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) Imeckus calls out Lintwerth's name and snaps his fingers, causing his dust mephit familiar (and up to 1 Bulk of objects carried by Lintwerth) to instantly transport to an adjacent square of Imeckus' choice, providing Lintwerth is within a mile.

**Quickened Casting** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** If Imeckus's next action is to cast a cantrip or spell that is 4th level or lower, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

</column>
name: Imeckus Stroon
